articles.title: Samsung Confirms Galaxy S26 Ultra Unpacked: How To Claim Your $900 Discount - Forbes
articles.description: The date and time of the next Galaxy Unpacked have been confirmed by Samsung with details of how to watch and early pre-order discounts.

articles.title: ChatGPT promised to help her find her soulmate. Then it betrayed her - NPR
articles.description: ChatGPT sent screenwriter Micky Small down a fantastical rabbit hole. Now, she's finding her way out.

articles.title: The DJI Romo robovac had security so poor, this man remotely accessed thousands of them - The Verge
articles.description: A man discovered that thousands of DJI Romo robot vacuums had a security issue that could have let strangers look into owners’ homes and remotely control them.

articles.title: Reanimal Review - IGN
articles.description: The creator of Little Nightmares returns with more of the dark puzzle platforming it has honed over the last decade.

articles.title: There's Confusion Over God of War Sons of Sparta Having Co-Op, Based on Its PlayStation Store Description - IGN
articles.description: God of War Sons of Sparta is a side-scrolling spin-off listed as having 1-2 player support. The only problem? Fans can't find its two-player option.

articles.title: Simulation showing what it would look like to go around Earth at the speed of light is absolutely wild - supercarblondie.com
articles.description: This simulation showed how long it would take to circle the Earth at the speed of light, and it'll leave you stunned when you see how fast it is
